Get-CFGAggregationAuthorizationList
AggregationAuthorizationArn AuthorizedAccountId AuthorizedAwsRegion CreationTime --------------------------- ------------------- ------------------- ------------ arn:aws:config:eu-west-1:123456789012:aggregation-authorization/123456789012/eu-west-1 123456789012 eu-west-1 8/26/2019 12:55:27 AM
example.description: This example retrieves authorizations granted to aggregators.
